verses.verse: The <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>. Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> concerning <S%H123>Edom<s%>: We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H8052>tidings<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and an <S%H6735>ambassador<s%> is <S%H7971>sent<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, <S%H6965>saying<s%>, Arise <S%H6965>ye<s%>, and let us rise up against her in <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
Behold <S%H5414><s%>, I have made thee <S%H6996>small<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: thou art <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H959>despised<s%>.

The <S%H2087>pride<s%> of thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath <S%H5377>deceived<s%> <S%H7931>thee<s%>, O thou that dwellest in the <S%H2288>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, whose <S%H3427>habitation<s%> is <S%H4791>high<s%>; that <S%H559>saith<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, Who shall bring me <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>?

Though thou mount on <S%H1361>high<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>, and though thy <S%H7064>nest<s%> be <S%H7760>set<s%> among the <S%H3556>stars<s%>, I will bring thee <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H5002>thence<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

If <S%H1590>thieves<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7703>thee<s%>, if robbers by <S%H3915>night<s%> (how art thou cut <S%H1820>off<s%>!), would they not <S%H1589>steal<s%> only till they had <S%H1767>enough<s%>? if <S%H1219>grape-gatherers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7604>thee<s%>, would they not leave some gleaning <S%H5955>grapes<s%>?
How are the things of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H2664>searched<s%>! how are his <S%H4710>hidden<s%> treasures sought <S%H2664>out<s%>!

All the <S%H582>men<s%> of thy <S%H1285>confederacy<s%> have <S%H7971>brought<s%> thee on thy <S%H1366>way<s%>, even to the border: the <S%H582>men<s%> that were at <S%H7965>peace<s%> with thee have <S%H5377>deceived<s%> <S%H3201>thee<s%>, and prevailed against <S%H3899>thee<s%>; they that eat thy bread <S%H7760>lay<s%> a <S%H4204>snare<s%> under <S%H8394>thee<s%>: there is no understanding in him.

Shall I not in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men out of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> out of the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>?

And thy <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H8487>men<s%>, O Teman, shall be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>, to the end that every <S%H376>one<s%> may be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> by <S%H6993>slaughter<s%>.
For the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H955>shame<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H3772>thee<s%>, and thou shalt be cut off for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou <S%H5975>stoodest<s%> on the other <S%H3117>side<s%>, in the day that <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H7617>carried<s%> away his <S%H2428>substance<s%>, and <S%H5237>foreigners<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into his <S%H8179>gates<s%>, and <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, even thou wast as one of <S%H259>them<s%>.

But <S%H7200>look<s%> not thou on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thy <S%H251>brother<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H5235>disaster<s%>, and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> not over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H6>destruction<s%>; neither <S%H6310>speak<s%> <S%H1431>proudly<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>distress<s%>.

Enter <S%H935><s%> not into the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%>; <S%H7200>yea<s%>, look not thou on their <S%H7451>affliction<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%>, neither <S%H7971>lay<s%> ye hands on their <S%H2428>substance<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%>.

And <S%H5975>stand<s%> thou not in the <S%H6563>crossway<s%>, to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> those of his that <S%H6412>escape<s%>; and deliver not <S%H5462>up<s%> those of his that <S%H8300>remain<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>distress<s%>.

For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> upon all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: as thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>, it shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H1576>thee<s%>; thy dealing shall <S%H7725>return<s%> upon thine own <S%H7218>head<s%>.

For as ye have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> upon my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, so shall all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>; <S%H8354>yea<s%>, they shall drink, and swallow <S%H3886>down<s%>, and shall be as though they had not <S%H3808>been<s%>.

But in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> there shall be those that <S%H6413>escape<s%>, and it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%>; and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H4180>possessions<s%>.

And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be a <S%H784>fire<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> a <S%H3852>flame<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> for <S%H7179>stubble<s%>, and they shall <S%H1814>burn<s%> among <S%H398>them<s%>, and devour <S%H8300>them<s%>; and there shall not be any remaining to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

And they of the <S%H5045>South<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, and they of the <S%H8219>lowland<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>; and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>; and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> shall possess <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of this <S%H2426>host<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that are among the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, shall possess even unto <S%H6886>Zarephath<s%>; and the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that are in <S%H5614>Sepharad<s%>, shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%>.

And <S%H3467>saviours<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> on <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>; and the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s.
